activities: The Norcross Group provides Digital Forensics and E-Discovery services to law firms, corporations and e-discovery vendors for litigation and corporate compliance.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
privacyprograms: The Norcross Group provides services to law firms, corporations and e-discovery vendors for litigation and corporate compliance. The Norcross Group processes data under the guidance and direction of our clients and according to that client’s personal information policy.
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commission; For all other types of data: American Arbitration Association
